attributes.action: give each school child within Great Britain money to fund their education wherever they want and not to get everyone to pay taxes to fund schools they have no interest in.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A child who attends a school of choice often has to pay school fees and some parents cannot afford this.  If each child was allocated a round figure of say £2000 per year which would go directly to the school of their choice.  Why should OAP's pay tax for education when their money could go towards a pension.  Why should people who choose to send their children to, for example fee paying Faith Schools have to pay for their education and still pay taxes to the state for education.
